لاوسن جاپان میں سہولیات کی دکانوں کی ایک: What is Lawson in Japan? Lawson convenience store chain Japan
Lawson is one of the biggest convenience store chains in Japan, following 7-Eleven and FamilyMart.
What is Lawson in Japan? Lawson convenience store chain Japan

Lawson, Inc. (株式会社ローソン, Kabushiki gaisha Rōson) is a convenience store franchise chain in Japan. The store originated in the United States in Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio, but exists today as a Japanese company based in Shinagawa, Tokyo.
